comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Is the phrase "close to home" open to interpretation? Or is this a second flag ascent in four days?

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: It's all relative. If folks want real torture, I'd be up for Sunshine. I could also be talked into the Northwest Passage or maybe Neva/Nelson Road.

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: I had a 1:30 meeting, so I had to get out early and make it a quick ride. I hit the Valmont Res loop. It was a bit breezy at times, but it was a good ride.
